snippet: Canada rebounded from a stunning loss to France to edge Slovakia, 4-1, at the world championship in Minsk, Belarus.
abstract: Canada rebounds from a stunning loss to France to edge Slovakia, 4-1, at the hockey world championship in Minsk, Belarus; United States makes it two wins in two days by defeating 2013 runner-up, Switzerland, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Canada rebounded from a stunning loss to France to edge Slovakia, 4-1, at the world championship in Minsk, Belarus.

headline.main: Canada and U.S. Prevail at Worlds
